featured.text: It is more polite to fix your eyes on him/her as long as you can. (C)
Jack is a person: he is polite, kind, and always shows respect for others.

definition.zh_def: 有禮貌的，對他人表示尊重和考慮的行為或態度。
definition.en_def: Showing good manners and respect towards others.
definition.example: She was very polite when she asked for help.
